venue.name: No Meeting Spot (activity is done remotely)

item.description:
Put your projection skills to the test!

By attempting to have an out-of-body experience, Boston Meetup members can try and identify the mystery object hidden inside the Red Box at the IAC’s New York office.

Although this project is designed for out-of-body experiences, members can participate in this event and access information about the hidden object using any of the following 3 methods:

  • Clairvoyance, or the acquisition of visual information through parapsychic means.
  • Psychometry, or the acquisition of information about an object by connecting with it directly by using your energies.
  • Lucid Projection, also known as the Out-of-Body Experience – the act of leaving your physical body and traveling to other places while in the non-physical body (‘spirit body’ or ‘astral double’).

Every two weeks, a new object will go into the box, and the old object will be revealed here on Meetup. This way, we can study our previous perceptions and aim at improving them in the future. Success may not come right away – but keep practicing, and you can do it.

For more information, including past objects and OBE techniques, please visit our New York site: http://www.meetup.com/NYC-OBE/pages/OBE_Fly-In_Project
item.name: OBE Fly-in Exercise
